metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7505 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A buffer overflow vulnerability was observed in divby function of Artifex Software, Inc. MuJS before 8c805b4eb19cf2af689c860b77e6111d2ee439d5. A successful exploitation of this issue can lead to code execution or denial of service condition.

notes.Note: ratliff> code is included in thirdparty directory

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
